Papers

One of our group's primary ways of disseminating our research is through peer reviewed publications. To make our data and finings as open and easy to access as possible, we have provided links to the PDFs of the manuscripts, the associated code used in the studies, and the raw data when applicable. Please feel free to reach out to talk about our work. We are always interested in building upon what we have done to tackle new and exciting scientific questions.
  • PDF version of published paper
  • Preprint version of manuscript
  • GitHub repository for paper
  • Raw data used in manuscript
